body_html:
Eigen's SSE implementation of log: https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/src/2355b229ea4c2876f490e726526cdcd8a63c7f54/Eigen/src/Core/arch/SSE/MathFunctions.h?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#MathFunctions.h-11:13
It comes from http://gruntthepeon.free.fr/ssemath/ which says log(inf)=88.72284 (i.e., log(inf) = log(max_float).

body:
Eigen's SSE implementation of log: https://bitbucket.org/eigen/eigen/src/2355b229ea4c2876f490e726526cdcd8a63c7f54/Eigen/src/Core/arch/SSE/MathFunctions.h?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#MathFunctions.h-11:13 
It comes from http://gruntthepeon.free.fr/ssemath/ which says log(inf)=88.72284 (i.e., log(inf) = log(max_float).
